Text.Page:
The vampirs' involvement with the dementalith came as a shock to Prefect Paka. He sent you to the Vale of the Fang to help Jelena discover the truth.

You unearthed a deal between the vampir nobles and the Cult of Lok to produce dementaliths in Sinestral Manor.
That {@linkcreature:67#1007#Paka} fellow has been looking for you. Odd company you keep, <PCNAME>.

Thank you for coming. There's more madness afoot. The popori and the vampirs were friends once, but now they've threatened my town.

If you went to the Vale of the Fang and...reduced their numbers a bit...people would feel safer.

And this time I'd reward you personally. That Bruke's proved himself a total ass!"I'll try to find another way."

You know, we poporis are born with a super sense of smell. And I smell something familiar about you.

I know that you got help from someone. I also happen to recognize that someone's scent...because that someone is a wanted criminal."A criminal?"

Shh! Someone might hear us. Personally, there's no doubt in my mind that she was falsely accused.

{@linkcreature:216#1026#Jelena}'s close with the princess, and has helped out the poporis a lot...and we never forget a favor!

She's still hanging around Vale of Fang, researching the Mad Blood Disease. I told my men to pretend they don't see her.

Go. Go and help her.

It's undeniable now that the vampirs are behind the Mad Blood Disease.

{@linkcreature:216#1026#Jelena} is researching the disease at the Runicar Research Camp.

Go to the Runicar Research Camp in the Vale of the Fang.

==================================
[Select teleport and go to the Runicar Research Camp.]
==================================

Well met, . Guess we both like making trouble!

So, I was right about the vampirs. They're being used! The nobles sold their people out to the Cult of Lok. Bad news. "I'm listening."

There's one cultist in particular—{@linkcreature:16#2406#Surdek}—who's always taking notes. We've got to get a look at them! It might give us an idea of how much blood magic they've learned, and how they're going to use it.

Think you can take him? Good. Do it. I'm going to scout a way into the Sinestral Manor.

A lot of vampirs have been going in and out of there.

Good! Well done! Let's see...

Hmm...

Yes, that's it. They've figured out how to use blood magic to create a Mad Blood Device.

That means that they can produce as many dementaliths they want.
"They can make dementaliths...?"

That's right. I'm sure that the device is inside the manor.

Alright! All we have to do is get rid of that device. But how we get inside...that's the problem.
Knock off {@LinkCreature:16#2406#Surdek} and bring me his notes. We've got to discover what they're up to.
